  • Setting up your configuration file
  • View page source

Setting up your configuration fileÂ¶

The CoSMoS configuration file specifies the model database path, the model executable paths, and the webserver, webviewer, and cycle settings:

[model_database]
path = "c:\\work\\cosmos\\model_database"

[executables]
delft3dfm_path = "c:\\Program Files (x86)\\Deltares\\Delft3D Flexible Mesh Suite HMWQ (2021.02)\\plugins\\DeltaShell.Dimr\\kernels"
sfincs_path    = "c:\\work\\checkouts\\git\\sfincs\\source\\sfincs\\x64\\Release"
hurrywave_path = "c:\\work\\checkouts\\git\\hurrywave\\source\\hurrywave\\x64\\Release"
xbeach_path    = "yourxbeachpath"

[webserver]
hostname = "c-oet0074.directory.intra"
path     = "../../opt/websites/static/deltares/cosmos"
username = "example"
password = "example"

[webviewer]
name    = "nopp_event_viewer"
version = "version02"

[cycle]
mode            = "single_shot"
interval        = 6
clean_up        = false
make_flood_maps = true
make_wave_maps  = true
upload          = true
get_meteo       = true

The following webviewer and cycle settings can be included in the configuration file. The cycle configurations can be overwritten when initialing CoSMoS.

webviewer settings

Description

name

Choose your own webviewer name.

version

A webviewer template from the folder configuration/webviewer_templates.

cycle settings

Description

mode

Run mode. Options: single_shot ??

interval

Cycle time interval (hours)

clean_up

Clean up folders after each cycle.

make_flood_maps

Make flood map tiles for webviewer.

make_wave_maps

Make wave map tiles for webviewer.

upload

Upload results to webviewer.

get_meteo

Download meteo from webserver.
